GetStart.title: Update your App with MirrorChyan
GetStart.description:
MirrorChyan is a third-party application distribution platform that makes it easier to update open source applications.

Users pay for use, and the revenue is shared with developers. In addition, MirrorChyan itself is also open source.

Transmission.title: Time Transfer
Transmission.description: Supports transferring the validity period of a CDKey to another CDKey
Transmission.orderTooOld: Order creation date is more than 3 days ago
